Key Match Events: Ishan Kishan scored 89 runs, Shreyas Iyer scored 57 runs
India scored 199 for 2, Sri Lanka scored 137 for 6
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was India's longest winning streak in T20Is which has now gone up to 10 matches
Others: Bhuveshwar Kumar took 2 wickets, Venkatesh Iyer took 2 wickets
Yuzvendra Chahal took 1 wicket, Ravindra Jadeja took 1 wicket
